phrases: This room is... the picture of peace for me!
And that room... is the picture of HELL for me.
I wish things could stay like this forever!
I WILL be your girlfriend, Big Brother!
I bought this on the way over!
My Younger Sister is My Girlfriend (BOOM!)
Uh, this is my friend, Kirie.
You stood in line for this?
Is this girl the main heroine?
YoungBOOM! has a famous voice actress for each
of the younger sister roles, so there is no main.
This character, Hikari, is based on the famous actor Hikaru Kongo, who is really popular right now.
So, naturally, she is become a favorite character.
They have already started selling merchandise for this character online.
Otherwise, people will think will that we are classmates.
Her voice is great, is not it?
Even better than on her last show.
She does a good job of not sounding too lovey-dovey, huh?
I cannot keep up with what they are saying!
I am the only one who cannot follow the conversation!
I cannot have the Master scolding me for it!
There she is, in the hallway!
Hmm... this is a tough one, is not it?
Well, I guess we should go with C.
These types tend to be shy, so I doubt they would enjoy being spoken to at school.
Her gaze is as sharp as ever, huh?
Her gaze is as sharp as ever, huh?
A would be a good choice.
In my experience, that makes your Favorability Rating go down...
I-in any case, pretending you did not see her is out of the question!
So... shall we save the game and try both options?
Hey... c'mon, do not talk to me at school.
Thank you for always spending time with my younger sister.
Motoba... you want to go home together?
Did you buy a new game?
Oh, I have heard of that.
They are always running commercials for it.
I have got to keep up with the new trends, so I have had my eye on this for a while now!
This game is for kids, so I can finish it by tomorrow!
Be sure to take breaks, though.
I have already gotten the hang of this thing.
This sure does have a lot of side quests...
Umaru, you are still playing that game?
I cannot find any of the super rare items...
How long have you been playing that today?
Come to think of it, she had the same look when she played that social-network game for an entire day...
Once she gets into it, she just cannot stop, huh?
Well, she will probably get tired of it soon.
Do not play games while you are eating!
And you are using the touch pen to eat!
It looks like more and more people are playing this game way too much...
This is not good at all!
I just could not find any super rare items...
I have to do something, and fast!
A way to make someone... quit the game?
One of our junior workers is playing it too much, and it is gotten me worried.
The truth is, this is about Umaru...
I do not really play games, so I do not know that much about them.
I am sorry, but I do not play them either.
Still, if there is something I really like...
I am sure I will not be able to stop myself.
This is no help at all, is it?
Well, it looks like a lot of fun.
You are ready to hop on the big wave, huh?
But we have only been playing for an hour!
When a game's as fun as this, it is a shame to play too much at once, right?
I like to enjoy it a little at a time.
When she likes something, she just cannot quit.
That is why I will teach her...
the way to TRULY enjoy something.
It sure was a long road getting here!
These modern games have gotten pretty tough, huh?
At least now she will have gotten over Chomp Chomp Watching.
Chomp Chomp Watching 2 will be going on sale soon!
And this time, there will be different versions: Truffle, Foie Gras, and Caviar!
With that horn, there is no doubt about it...
That is how Taihei was back in high school.
Well, it was exaggerated a little but it was not a lie, right?
He was a test-taking demon who always got 100s, so they called him Taihei the Demon.
They called you that all the time.
Like, even when you met Kanau...
That is enough talk about the past.
I am going to get dinner ready.
Nah, he is a good guy.
He would not get mad over something like this.
Taihei would not yell or do something half-cocked.
Sure, he will scold you, but he does not actually get MAD, right?
But he can get super cranky if you bug him when he is cooking.
I would sure like to see Ebina again.
Does she not come over often?
I started thinking, a girl like that could make friends with my sister for sure.
Sis always has a scary look on her face, so I do not think she has many friends.
Ebina does not seem like the type who would worry about that, right?
You are a good guy, Bomba!
I often think to myself, Self, you ARE a good guy!
Like, I think the area around my eyes TOTALLY makes me look like a good guy, right?
You are in for it now!
They sure are getting worked up...
You are in for it now!
They sure are getting worked up...
Bomba is almost out of Life!
I have to bring the laundry in!
Bomba is almost out of Life!
I have to bring the laundry in!
Metal Nyankosu merely shakes its head!
Metal Nyankosu merely shakes its head!
I am going to go get it.
So stay out of the kitchen!
Jeez, and these were almost dry!
L-look, we are sorry for barging in here, but you are getting a bit TOO angry.
I put the lid on just in case when I stepped away from the stove, but I did not make myself clear...
In the 20 years I have known you, that was the first time I have seen you get mad!
It is been more like 10, right?
Oh, it is Cold and Bristly Girl.
Yeah, she does not look too happy...
Well, she only seems to go from cold to painfully rude, so: Cold and Bristly Girl.
I would say that is some nice naming, would not you?
I am not sure I am following any of this...
Anyway, the timing could not be better.
I brought a present with me today.
It is an Italian cat figurine.
I gave one to your brother as well.
You have had this customized all nice and cute, have not you?
Please, have this one as well.
But, what is this present for?
It is just my way of thanking you for all you have done for me.
This is for you, Cold and Bristly Girl.
I do not even want this, but I totally accepted it!
Come to think of it, this is the first time I have gotten a present from someone who was not a family member...
This is the Damage version of Madam Black Death Devil!
Her Damage powers make her already-erotic clothing even MORE erotic!
Aah, I am so glad that this made you happy.
Honestly, I was surprised by your choice in that game we played before.
I never dreamed someone could beat me at a girl's game!
This is my all-time favorite figurine.
It is only right that you have it!
That does not make me happy at all!
And I do not know how to react when getting a present I do not want!
I never thought you would get THIS happy!
You sure lucked out, huh, Kirie?
Also, this thing is really well made!
You can only buy it at anime events.
I will give it to my Master!
If it is mine, it should be all right to give it away!
I cannot have something so LEWD go anywhere near my Master!
Well, if you are all free, we will be having a Christmas party!
Christmas has no place in this house!
I will go buy you a present!
Oh, it is Cold and Bristly Girl.
You sure lucked out, huh, Kirie?
You sure lucked out, huh, Kirie?
YOU SURE LUCKED OUT, HUH, KIRIE?
Note: German for Every rose has its thorn.
Once you crave it, there is no going back.
And right now, your burger combo meal comes with CRISPY NUGGETS!
Where do they get off using a commercial like this?!
It sure feels like winter now, huh?
YOU-um, here is a picture from when we went to the movies the other day.
I wish to go somewhere during our winter vacation, indeed!
Would you like to come to my house?
Is there anywhere you want to go, Umaru?
Mention hamburgers, and of course that means GERMANY!
Speaking of, you mentioned in your class introduction that you are from Germany, right?
Umaru, how kind of you to remember!
Let us all go feast on Japanese hamburgers!
I-I have never been here before.
This is one place you can NOT go to unless you are with friends!
I recommend one of the combo meals, indeed!
Once you crave it, there is no going back.
This convenience store burger and fries go great with cola!
It is hard going out to eat all alone, so having it at home is best.
I was just thinking, this feels like a high school girl experience, huh?
What is with all of you?
E-Ebina, are you going to eat all those?
Just one has about 500 calories, you know.
I was going to freeze them when I got home!
Let us all eat before they get cold.
Indeed, these taste best when they are freshly made!
It seems we will be doing this next episode preview together.
That is fine and all, but why do you keep calling me Sensei?
It is a sign of respect!
But I could call you Wise One, or Master, or Your Majesty, or Honored Husband -
Those last two seem sort of different...
